name: Furwind
summary:
Furwind is a light-hearted platformer with a very classic approach, colorful graphics and a gameplay for everyone. The game takes place in a magical world inhabited by intelligent animals. 
 
The story begins when a great evil has been awaken by a dark cult and they are threatening to destroy the balance of nature. Our hero is Furwind, a little fox, he is the chosen to restore balance to the world. 
 
Through the game, Furwind will get new powers to to help him in his journey. This powers are acquired after beating the tests imposed by the ancestors-totems he discovers in his path. In the shamanic trip needed to obtain each power our protagonist will suffer a nightmare where he must advance without stopping, being chased by a dark and terrible mist. 
 
Furwind can use his powers at any moment but they are no infinite, he can refill them in a shop after each stage exchanging gems that are find through the different levels. 
 
As a platform game, Furwind evoke classics like Rayman and Mario. Far from common action-shooting titles, Furwind try to recover gameplay of games from the past but with a unique visual style. This game pretend to challenge the player trough levels full of enemies and traps testing his skill and timing.
storyline:
Through a horrendous ritual, the evil Darhûn cult has woken up an old hidden evil trapped in the deeps of the jungle. 
 
The village of our protagonist, Furwind, has been consumed by the flames at the hands of the malicious shamans of the cult. Before securing the survivors, Whiteclaw the clan chief, asked you to end the terrible evil that threatens all the inhabitants of the jungle. 
 
Will you guide Furwind throught endless dangers? Can you defeat the dark evil that is stalking all his friends?
